trans-unit.source: Provides functionality to discover a bindable list and the properties of the items contained in the list when they differ from the public properties of the object to which they bind.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能以发现可绑定列表和它们的区别它们将绑定对象的公共属性时，在列表中包含的项的属性。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用的类，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>

trans-unit.source: Note that for Smartphone applications, this class requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于智能手机应用程序，此类需要 Windows 移动版本 5.0 软件智能手机。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定的数据源相关联的列表。

trans-unit.source: If the data source specified by the `list` parameter implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, then the GetList method will return an object of type <xref:System.Collections.IList> that represents the associated list.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源指定`list`参数实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>接口，则 GetList 方法将返回类型的对象<xref:System.Collections.IList>表示相关联的列表。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method will just return the specified data source since there is no underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法只需将返回指定的数据源，因为没有基础列表。

trans-unit.source: The data source to examine for its underlying list.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其基础列表的数据源。

trans-unit.source: An representing the underlying list if it exists; otherwise, the original data source specified by list.
trans-unit.target: 表示基础列表，如果它存在; 否则，原始数据源指定 list 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object, typically a list, from the evaluation of a specified data source and optional data member.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象，通常的列表，从指定的数据源和可选数据成员的评估。

trans-unit.source: If the data member is `null` or an empty string (""), the GetList method returns `dataSource`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该数据成员是`null`或空字符串 ("")，GetList 方法返回`dataSource`。

trans-unit.source: If `dataSource` is not a list, GetList returns the value of the `dataSource` property that matches the `dataMember` value.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dataSource`不是列表中，GetList 返回的值`dataSource`符合属性`dataMember`值。

trans-unit.source: If `dataSource` is a list, in that it implements either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interfaces, then the underlying list is obtained by choosing an item from the list and querying that item for the value of the property named by `dataMember`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dataSource`在于它实现所显示列表，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口，然后通过从列表中选择项并查询由名为的属性的值该项获取基础列表`dataMember`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ICurrencyManagerProvider>

trans-unit.source: The data source from which to find the list.
trans-unit.target: 从中查找列表数据源。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source property that contains the list.
trans-unit.target: 包含列表的数据源属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An representing the underlying list if it was found; otherwise, dataSource.
trans-unit.target: 表示基础列表是否找到; 否则为 dataSource 。

trans-unit.source: The specified data member name did not match any of the properties found for the data source.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据成员名称不匹配任何找到数据源的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that describes the properties of an item type contained in a specified data source, or properties of the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref>说明包含在指定的数据源或指定的数据源的属性的项类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: The GetListItemProperties method is used to examine the collection of properties for a data source.
trans-unit.target: GetListItemProperties 方法用于检查数据源属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: The action of this method depends on the actual type of the `list` parameter according to the following table: |Parameter type|Action| |--------------------|------------| |A type that is a list or collection of items.|Returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> describing the properties of the item type contained in the list.| |A type that is not a list or collection.|Returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> describing the properties of the type.| |`null`|Returns an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>.|
trans-unit.target: 此方法的操作取决于的实际类型`list`根据下表的参数: |参数类型 |操作 | |--------------------|------------| |为列表或项的集合的类型。 |返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>描述列表中包含的项类型的属性。 | |不是列表或集合的类型。 |返回<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>描述类型的属性。 | |`null`|返回一个空<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>。 |</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The data source to examine for property information.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的属性信息的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The containing the properties of the items contained in list, or properties of list.
trans-unit.target: 包含的属性中包含的项 list ，或的属性list.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that describes the properties of an item type contained in a collection property of a data source.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref>描述数据源的集合属性中包含的项类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> array to indicate which properties to examine.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>数组以指示要检查的属性。

trans-unit.source: The GetListItemProperties method is useful when the data source has properties that are a collection of items and you need to know properties of the item type in the collection, not the properties of the collection type.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源具有是项的集合的属性，并且你需要知道的集合中的项类型的属性不是集合类型的属性，该 GetListItemProperties 方法很有用。

trans-unit.source: The data source to be examined for property information.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其属性信息的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> array describing which properties of the data source to examine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>数组，描述要检查的数据的哪些属性源。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> describing the properties of the item type contained in a collection property of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>描述数据源的集合属性中包含的项类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that describes the properties of an item type contained in the specified data member of a data source.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref>说明包含在指定的数据成员的数据源中的项类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> array to indicate which properties to examine.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>数组以指示要检查的属性。

trans-unit.source: The `dataMember` parameter can be `null`, in which case the GetListItemProperties method will return property descriptions using the data source and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> array.
trans-unit.target: `dataMember`参数可以为`null`，在这种情况下 GetListItemProperties 方法将返回使用数据源的属性说明和<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>数组。</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingHelper.GetListItemProperties%2A> is useful when the data member has properties that are a collection of items and you need to know properties of the item type in the collection, not the properties of the collection type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingHelper.GetListItemProperties%2A>数据成员具有是项的集合的属性，并且你需要知道的集合中的项类型的属性不是集合类型的属性时非常有用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingHelper.GetListItemProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source to be examined for property information.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其属性信息的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The optional data member to be examined for property information.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其属性信息的可选数据成员。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> array describing which properties of the data member to examine.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>数组，描述要检查的数据成员的属性。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> describing the properties of an item type contained in a collection property of the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>描述指定的数据源的集合属性中包含的项类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified data member could not be found in the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的数据源中找不到指定的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the items in the specified list.
trans-unit.target: 指定列表中返回项的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the `list` parameter is not a list or array, the type returned will be that of the `list` parameter itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果`list`参数不是列表或数组，返回的类型将的`list`参数本身。

trans-unit.source: The list to be examined for type information.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其类型信息的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the items contained in the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>列表中所含的项。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the data type of the items in the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的数据源中返回项的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: This version of the GetListItemType method is used to determine the type of items used in complex or simple data-binding schemes.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的 GetListItemType 方法用于确定在复杂或简单数据绑定方案中使用的项的类型。

trans-unit.source: This static method may be useful in determining whether a proposed data-binding scheme is appropriate before attempting it.
trans-unit.target: 此静态方法可能用于确定尝试它之前是否适合建议的数据绑定方案。

trans-unit.source: If `dataSource` is `null`, the property descriptors cannot be found for the list items of the specified data member, or the property descriptor for the list item is an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>, then this method returns the type of the <xref:System.Object> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dataSource`是`null`、 找不到指定的数据成员的列表项的属性说明符或列表项的属性描述符是是<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>，则此方法返回的类型的<xref:System.Object>类。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: If `dataMember` is `null` or empty, then this method returns the <xref:System.Type> of the items in the data source, if it is a list; otherwise, this method returns the <xref:System.Type> of the data source itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dataMember`是`null`或为空，则此方法将返回<xref:System.Type>的数据源中的项，如果它是一个列表; 否则，此方法返回<xref:System.Type>的数据源本身。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The data source to examine for items.
trans-unit.target: 要检查其项的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The optional name of the property on the data source that is to be used as the data member.
trans-unit.target: 是要用作数据成员对数据源属性的可选名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For complex data binding, the of the items represented by the dataMember in the data source; otherwise, the of the item in the list itself.
trans-unit.target: 对于复杂数据绑定，所表示的项的 dataMember 中数据源; 否则为列表自身中的项。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of an underlying list, given a data source and optional <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: 返回基础的名称列表，给定的数据源和可选<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>数组。

trans-unit.source: If `listAccessors` is `null` or empty, the GetListName method returns the name of the data source type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`listAccessors`是`null`或为空，GetListName 方法返回的数据源类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The data source to examine for the list name.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的列表名称的数据源。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects to find in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>要数据源中查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: This can be<xref uid="langword_csharp_ null" name=" null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_ null" name=" null" href=""></xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the list in the data source, as described by listAccessors, or the name of the data source type.
trans-unit.target: 在数据源，如下所述的列表的名称 listAccessors ，或数据源类型的名称。
